sn22.98:4.2: Seated at one side that mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn22.98:4.3: “Sir, is there any form at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever?
sn22.98:4.7: consciousness at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever?”
sn22.98:4.8: “Mendicant, there is no form at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
sn22.98:4.12: consciousness at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.”
